name: Never Gonna Put You Down
description:
AHHH! An alien is invading your quiet, idyllic neighborhood! 

Run away and hide from his ship in houses and cars in order to avoid its ship's tractor beam! You must stay away from the beam and alive for 5 minutes.

Controls:

Movement: WASD

If you get trapped by the tractor beam, wiggle away by mashing any two keys on your keyboard.

Hide in houses and cars (but please do explore! ;) )

Developed for the "Summer Game Jam Just For Kicks" By:

Marcello Folco (march_in_march)

Jonna Anne Pedersen (ankylosaurus)

Brittni Martin (existentialtea)

HUGE THANKS TO Kyle Gartner and Thomas Pryde for programming troubleshooting.
